original.value: Soldier "Absolute Power"

translation.value: Absolute Rifleman

original.value: Soldier of the "Absolute Power" special forces group Absolute Power provide fully capable special operations forces to defend modern society its interests and plan and synchronize operations against terrorist networks. Agents work on the territory of the whole world. Absolute Power of the world for them is absolute power of war.

translation.value: Rifleman of the "Absolute" special forces group "Absolute" provide fully capable special operations forces to defend modern society and its interests, acting primarily as a counter-terrorism unit. Absolute squads operate worldwide. They settle for no less than absolute victory.
